content: Game is often slow to load. On new smartphones it shouldn't take 10 seconds to load the main menu between games. In addition, you can't play any games at all for 24 hours once a week as they are "calculating results" for the new season. I think they should at least have the option for non-leaderboard games during that time. Unfair that you can't play the game when you paid for it. The sudoku school and help feature is a nice added touch.
replyContent: Hello and thank you for your feedback! I have shared your thoughts and concerns with our design team to be taken into consideration for future implementation. Please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at help@marmalademail.com if you have any suggestions or even concerns to share.

content: Game is okay but can't play on Sunday? Calculating results all day? Kind of a bummer. If I pay for it I expect to be able to play any day at any time. Also wish there was an option to turn the screen black, the white background starts to hurt my eyes after awhile. Overall i enjoyed the game. Basically just sudoku w leaderboards but with a small monopoly twist. Next move help have been nice, wasn't a big fan of auto fill at first but it grows on you. It helps with speed & not every round has it.
good
You can learn how to play, practice and competitive (online with friends or random). Nice visuals. Really good.
replyContent: Hello! Thank you so much for your kind review! We are delighted to hear you enjoy the game! Please let us know if you have any suggestions on how we can improve Monopoly Sudoku, as we are constantly monitoring player feedback and very often implement the most requested features- help@marmalademail.com for a more direct channel. Thank you!

content: I changed my rating because of the lag. The game is fun but it's frustrating to push a button and have to wait for a response....
replyContent: Hi and thank you for your feedback. We will continue to tweak Monopoly Sudoku's performance in our coming updates to ensure that the game runs as smoothly as possible for everyone. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us at help@marmalademail.com should you encounter any other technical issues. Thank you!

content: It won't load!

Frustrating. This would be an excellent sudoku game if it wasn't for the freezing and slowness on the menu screen. I really enjoy it, when I can get into a game. Such a shame that this is still happening. Devs please sort it out
I really like the concept of the app and I like learning how to actually play sudoku but there is some major lag and freezing issues on this app if you're doing anything other than solving a puzzle.
My favorite Sudoku game ever. I love how easy it is to play by yourself or with someone else. Fun, clear game play.

For a game that costs so much it should really run better. The game is constantly frozen in the menu screen. Also you don't get to play for one day of the week while they calculate that scores from the last tournament. While this is a fun game when you can actually get it to work is is definitely not worth the money at all
replyContent: Hi Serrah and thank you for your feedback. We will continue to tweak Monopoly Sudoku's performance in our coming updates to ensure that the game runs as smoothly as possible for everyone. content: Waste of time. I tried to play without auto notes. Could not take them off. I would not play this as a free game. It's a shame I couldn't give 0 stars. RIP OFF!!!
Thank you for fixing the issues! I love playing and I really enjoy this set up where it's new puzzles all of the time with helpful hints and different challenge levels.
replyContent: Hello Manda and thank you for your review! A new update addressing this issue was made available a few days ago so if you are still experiencing this problem, we kindly want to ask you to update the Monopoly Sudoku. content: The sudoku school is great for learning new patterns and improving. The Monopoly bit is probably unnecessary but it adds a little competition and longevity compared to a plain library of game boards. App is a bit laggy but only on the menu; doesn't affect game play.
replyContent: Hi Erica, a new update addressing this issue (v0.1.15) was made available a few days ago so if you are still experiencing this problem, we kindly ask you to update the Monopoly Sudoku. Please let us know if this helped and thank you for your patience!

content: Game play is still great, and I love that the hints are actually strategy lessons instead of just revealing the number. Prior issues are mostly fixed. A great game to have, especially if you're working on mastering Sudoku.

replyContent: Hi Andrew, we emailed you back twice, 6 days ago, to ****emongo@gmail. Do you think it's possible that our message ended up in your spam inbox? content: I like the game as a whole and I like that it is monopoly themed. My problems with it so far are that I couldn't turn off auto notes which takes the fun out of solving it. I tried messing with settings and nothing fixed it. I also couldn't change my username even though there is an edit button. It always went straight back to the generic one, and I just happened to get a really unflattering one that I want to change. I will keep playing it for now though.
replyContent: Hi Christy! You should be able to turn off the auto-notes at the start of any Random, Play a Friend and Practice matches. You can also always find one or two Championships with the auto-notes turned off - simply look out for the purple pencil icon! As for the username issue, we are on it and will have it fixed as soon as possible! Our apologies.

content: So far no issues. Seems to be a solid sudoku app!
absolutely LOVE this game !!
fun game, but very glitchy.

content: Sorry but do not pay for this game. There is virtually nothing in it related to monopoly. Once a day you roll dice and move on a monopoly board and get a tiny bonus of chips. That's it. It is all sudoku but if that's all you want then just get a free app.
replyContent: Hi Harrison and thank you for your review. MONOPOLY Sudoku is, first and foremost, a Sudoku game. Monopoly is the game's thematic. There are a few gameplay elements related Monopoly, however, the vast majority are simply visual. If this was not clear to you upon downloading, we would be happy to assist you with a refund. - help@marmalademail.com
